t: Official U.S. PlayStation Magazine - Wikipedia
s: March 19, 2025 - Official U.S. PlayStation Magazine (often abbreviated to OPM) was a monthly video game magazine published by Ziff Davis Media. It was a sister publication of Electronic Gaming Monthly. The magazine focused exclusively on PlayStation hardware, software, and culture, covering the original ...

t: PlayStation: The Official Magazine - Wikipedia
s: April 5, 2025 - PlayStation: The Official Magazine (PTOM) was a magazine originally known as PlayStation Magazine (PSM), becoming PlayStation: The Official Magazine in late 2007. PlayStation: The Official Magazine was published 13 times a year by Future plc until its cancellation in late 2012.

t: Official U.S. PlayStation Magazine - The Big Cartoon Wiki
s: Official U.S. PlayStation Magazine is a discontinued magazine that was published by Ziff Davis Media from 1997 to 2007. It focused completely on the PlayStation brand, covering its video games and culture. Each issue also contained a disc of a playable demo or video for a PlayStation game.
